cast.overview: Brought back to life by an unorthodox scientist, a young woman runs off with a lawyer on a whirlwind adventure across the continents. Free from the prejudices of her times, she grows steadfast in her purpose to stand for equality and liberation.
cast.title: Poor Things

details.biography:
Raphaël Thiéry is known for Poor Things (2023), The Dreamer (2023) and Scarlet (2022).

Musician and member of the band Faubourg de Boignard.

He began his acting career at 40 and worked as a film extra before getting a supporting role in the 2015 film "Rester Vertical," which took him to the Cannes Film Festival in 2016. He secured his first leading role in 2021 in "L'envol" by Pietro Marcello.
details.name: Raphaël Thiéry
